name: Acridian
oracle_text: Echo {1}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor_text: The elves of Argoth were trained to ride these creatures, even when their mounts traveled upside-down.

name: Angelic Page
oracle_text:
Flying
{T}: Target attacking or blocking creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: If only every message were as perfect as its bearers.

name: Annul
oracle_text: Counter target artifact or enchantment spell.
flavor_text: The most effective way to destroy a spell is to ensure it was never cast in the first place.

name: Arc Lightning
oracle_text: Arc Lightning deals 3 damage divided as you choose among one, two, or three targets.
flavor_text: Rainclouds don't last long in Shiv, but that doesn't stop the lightning.

name: Argothian Swine
oracle_text: Trample
flavor_text: In Argoth, the shortest path between two points is the one the swine make.

name: Befoul
oracle_text: Destroy target land or nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The land putrefied at its touch, turned into an oily bile in seconds."
—Radiant, archangel

name: Blanchwood Treefolk
flavor_text: The massive Argivian attack on their rooted kindred was a declaration of war to the treefolk.

name: Blood Vassal
oracle_text: Sacrifice Blood Vassal: Add {B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"They are bred to suffer and born to die. Much like humans."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

name: Bog Raiders
oracle_text: Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
flavor_text:
"Let weak feed on weak, that we may divine the nature of strength."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Bravado
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each other creature you control.
flavor_text:
"We drive the dragons from our home. Why should we fear you?"
—Fire Eye, viashino bey

name: Breach
oracle_text: Target creature gets +2/+0 and gains fear until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)

name: Brilliant Halo
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
When Brilliant Halo is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Brilliant Halo to its owner's hand.

name: Cackling Fiend
oracle_text: When Cackling Fiend enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text: Its windpipe is only the first to amplify its maddening laughter.

name: Carrion Beetles
oracle_text: {2}{B}, {T}: Exile up to three target cards from a single graveyard.
flavor_text: It's all fun and games until someone loses an eye.

name: Catalog
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then discard a card.
flavor_text:
"Without order comes errors, and errors kill on Tolaria."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Cave Tiger
oracle_text: Whenever Cave Tiger becomes blocked by a creature, Cave Tiger gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The druids found a haven in the cool limestone tunnels beneath Argoth. The invaders found only tigers.

name: Cloak of Mists
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked.
flavor_text:
"All we could lose, we did. All we could keep, we do. And both are shrouded by mists."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Congregate
oracle_text: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing."
—*Song of All*, canto 642

name: Coral Merfolk
flavor_text: It is not unusual for a single family of coral merfolk to spend centuries carefully guiding the growth of the reefs where they make their home.

name: Corrupt
oracle_text: Corrupt deals damage to any target equal to the number of Swamps you control. You gain life equal to the damage dealt this way.
flavor_text: Yawgmoth brushed Urza's mind, and Urza's world convulsed.

name: Curfew
oracle_text: Each player returns a creature they control to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: ". . . But I'm not tired!"

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"From void evolved Phyrexia. Great Yawgmoth, Father of Machines, saw its perfection. Thus the Grand Evolution began."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Despondency
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -2/-0.
When Despondency is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Despondency to its owner's hand.

name: Disciple of Grace
oracle_text:
Protection from black
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Beauty is beyond law.

name: Disciple of Law
oracle_text:
Protection from red
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: A religious order for religious order.

name: Disenchant
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text:
"Let Phyrexia breed evil in the darkness; my holy light will reveal its taint."
—Serra

name: Disruptive Student
oracle_text: {T}: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {1}.
flavor_text:
"Teferi is a problem student. Always late for class. No appreciation for constructive use of time."
—Barrin, progress report

name: Drifting Meadow
oracle_text:
Drifting Meadow enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {W}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Dromosaur
oracle_text: Whenever Dromosaur blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +2/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: They say dromosaurs are frightened of dogs, even little ones. There are no dogs in Shiv. Not even little ones.

name: Duress
oracle_text: Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a noncreature, nonland card from it. That player discards that card.
flavor_text:
"We decide who is worthy of our works."
—Gix, Yawgmoth praetor

name: Elvish Herder
oracle_text: {G}: Target creature gains trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: Before Urza and Mishra came to Argoth, the herders prevented their creatures from stampeding. During the war, they encouraged it.

name: Elvish Lyrist
oracle_text: {G}, {T}, Sacrifice Elvish Lyrist: Destroy target enchantment.

name: Exhume
oracle_text: Each player puts a creature card from their graveyard onto the battlefield.
flavor_text:
"Death—an outmoded concept. We sleep, and we change."
—Sitrik, birth priest

name: Expunge
oracle_text:
Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Falter
oracle_text: Creatures without flying can't block this turn.
flavor_text: Like a sleeping dragon, Shiv stirs and groans at times.

name: Fertile Ground
oracle_text:
Enchant land
Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.
flavor_text: The forest was too lush for the brothers to despoil—almost.

name: Fiery Mantle
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
{R}: Enchanted creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
When Fiery Mantle is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Fiery Mantle to its owner's hand.

name: Fortitude
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Sacrifice a Forest: Regenerate enchanted creature.
When Fortitude is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Fortitude to its owner's hand.

name: Gaea's Bounty
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two Forest cards, reveal those cards, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The forest grew back so quickly that lumbering machines were suspended in the treetops.

name: Goblin Matron
oracle_text: When Goblin Matron enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a Goblin card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: There's always room for one more.

name: Goblin Patrol
oracle_text: Echo {R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor_text:
"Take the sharp metal stick and make a lotta holes."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Goblin Raider
oracle_text: Goblin Raider can't block.
flavor_text: He was proud to wear the lizard skin around his waist, just for the fun of annoying the enemy.

name: Goblin Spelunkers
oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text:
"It only short jump. You go first."
"AIIIEEEE!"
"Hmm . . . we go different way now."

name: Goblin War Buggy
oracle_text:
Haste
Echo {1}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)

name: Gorilla Warrior
flavor_text: The gorilla beat its chest and threw great handfuls of leaves into the air. It howled challenge and showed its teeth. The mechanical soldier, not understanding, simply killed it.

name: Headlong Rush
oracle_text: Attacking creatures gain first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text: A landslide of goblins poured toward the defenders—tumbling, rolling, and bouncing their way down the steep hillside.

name: Healing Salve
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Target player gains 3 life.
• Prevent the next 3 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text:
"Xantcha is recovering. The medicine is slow, but my magic would have killed her."
—Serra, to Urza

name: Heat Ray
oracle_text: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.
flavor_text: It's not known whether the Thran built the device to forge their wonders or to defend them.

name: Hermetic Study
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."
flavor_text:
"Books can be replaced; a prize student cannot. Be patient."
—Urza, to Barrin

name: Hidden Spider
oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell with flying, if Hidden Spider is an enchantment, Hidden Spider becomes a 3/5 Spider creature with reach. (It can block creatures with flying.)
flavor_text: It wants only to dress you in silk.

name: Hollow Dogs
oracle_text: Whenever Hollow Dogs attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: A hollow dog is never empty. It is filled with thirst for the hunt.

name: Horseshoe Crab
oracle_text: {U}: Untap Horseshoe Crab.
flavor_text: In the final days before the disaster, all the crabs on Tolaria migrated from inlets, streams, and ponds back to the sea. No one took note.

name: Hush
oracle_text:
Destroy all enchantments.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Launch
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying.
When Launch is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Launch to its owner's hand.

name: Lay Waste
oracle_text:
Destroy target land.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Looming Shade
oracle_text: {B}: Looming Shade gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text: The shade tracks victims by reverberations of the pipes, as a spider senses prey tangled in its trembling web.

name: Lull
oracle_text:
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Monk Realist
oracle_text: When Monk Realist enters the battlefield, destroy target enchantment.
flavor_text: "We plant the seeds of doubt to harvest the crop of wisdom."

name: Opal Caryatid
oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Caryatid is an enchantment, Opal Caryatid becomes a 2/2 Soldier creature.

name: Opal Gargoyle
oracle_text: When an opponent casts a creature spell, if Opal Gargoyle is an enchantment, Opal Gargoyle becomes a 2/2 Gargoyle creature with flying.

name: Pacifism
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor_text:
"Fight? I cannot. I do not care if I live or die, so long as I can rest."
—Urza, to Serra

name: Path of Peace
oracle_text: Destroy target creature. Its owner gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"When the sword becomes a burden, let the warrior lay it aside that another with a truer heart might take it up."
—Radiant, archangel

name: Pegasus Charger
oracle_text:
Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"The clouds came alive and dove to the earth! Hooves flashed among the dark army, who fled before the spectacle of fury."
—*Song of All*, canto 211

name: Pendrell Drake
oracle_text:
Flying
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The mages of Tolaria found strange ways to spend their free time. Occasionally they had contests to see whose kite was eaten last.

name: Pendrell Flux
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice this creature unless you pay its mana cost."
flavor_text: Devoured by the mists, Tolaria was stuck in time, trapped between two eternal heartbeats.

name: Pestilence
oracle_text:
At the beginning of the end step, if no creatures are on the battlefield, sacrifice Pestilence.
{B}: Pestilence deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.

name: Phyrexian Ghoul
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature: Phyrexian Ghoul gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Phyrexia wastes nothing. Its food chain is a spiraling cycle.

name: Polluted Mire
oracle_text:
Polluted Mire enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {B}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Pouncing Jaguar
oracle_text: Echo {G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor_text: One pounce, she's hungry—you die quickly. Two, she's teaching her cubs—you're in for a long day.

name: Power Sink
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {X}. If that player doesn't, they tap all lands with mana abilities they control and lose all unspent mana.

name: Power Taint
oracle_text:
Enchant enchantment
At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted enchantment's controller, that player loses 2 life unless they pay {2}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Priest of Titania
oracle_text: {T}: Add {G} for each Elf on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Titania rewards all those who honor the forest by making them a living part of it.

name: Ravenous Skirge
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Ravenous Skirge attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hunger is a kind of madness—and here, all madness flourishes.

name: Raze
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a land.
Destroy target land.
flavor_text: The viashino believe that the oldest mountains hate everyone equally.

name: Reflexes
oracle_text:
Enchant creature (Target a creature as you cast this. This card enters the battlefield attached to that creature.)
Enchanted creature has first strike. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)
flavor_text:
"Here's how ya win. Don't let the other guy hit back first."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Rejuvenate
oracle_text:
You gain 6 life.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Remote Isle
oracle_text:
Remote Isle enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {U}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Rescind
oracle_text:
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Retromancer
oracle_text: Whenever Retromancer becomes the target of a spell or ability, Retromancer deals 3 damage to that spell or ability's controller.
flavor_text: "If one harm us, strike them in return. So sayeth the bey."

name: Rewind
oracle_text: Counter target spell. Untap up to four lands.
flavor_text:
"Time flows like a river. In Tolaria we practice the art of building dams."
—Barrin, master wizard

name: Rune of Protection: Black
oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a black source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

{W}: The next time a blue source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a green source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

{W}: The next time a red source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Rune of Protection: White
oracle_text:
{W}: The next time a white source of your choice would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.

name: Sanctum Custodian
oracle_text: {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to any target this turn.
flavor_text: Serra told them to guard Urza as he healed. Five years they stood.

name: Sandbar Merfolk
oracle_text: Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: You are not prey until a predator knows of your existence.

name: Scrap
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Serra Zealot
oracle_text: First strike
flavor_text:
"The humans are useful in their way, but they must be commanded as the builder commands the stone. Be soft with them, and they will become soft."
—Radiant, archangel

name: Shower of Sparks
oracle_text: Shower of Sparks deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: The viashino had learned how to operate the rig through trial and error—mostly error.

name: Sicken
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets -1/-1.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: Urza dared to attack Phyrexia. Slowly, it retaliated.

name: Silent Attendant
oracle_text: {T}: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text: "The answer to life should never be death; it should always be more life, wrapped tight around us like precious silks."

name: Skittering Skirge
oracle_text:
Flying
When you cast a creature spell, sacrifice Skittering Skirge.
flavor_text: The imps' warbling cries echo through Phyrexia's towers like those of mourning doves in a cathedral.

name: Slippery Karst
oracle_text:
Slippery Karst enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {G}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Smoldering Crater
oracle_text:
Smoldering Crater enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add {R}.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Spire Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Spire Owl enters the battlefield, look at the top four cards of your library, then put them back in any order.

name: Symbiosis
oracle_text: Two target creatures each get +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Although the elves of Argoth always considered them a nuisance, the pixies made fine allies during the war against the machines.

name: Tolarian Winds
oracle_text: Discard all the cards in your hand, then draw that many cards.
flavor_text: Afterward, Tolaria's winds were like the whispers of lost wizards, calling for life.

name: Treetop Rangers
oracle_text: Treetop Rangers can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text:
"If you can't catch them, cut the trees down from beneath them. Force them to fight on our terms."
—Mishra

name: Unnerve
oracle_text: Each opponent discards two cards.
flavor_text:
"If fear is the only tool you have left, then you'll never control me."
—Xantcha, to Gix

name: Unworthy Dead
oracle_text: {B}: Regenerate Unworthy Dead.
flavor_text:
"Great Yawgmoth moves across the seas of shard and bone and rust. We exalt him in life, in death, and in between."
—*Phyrexian Scriptures*

name: Veiled Serpent
oracle_text:
When an opponent casts a spell, if Veiled Serpent is an enchantment, Veiled Serpent becomes a 4/4 Serpent creature with "This creature can't attack unless defending player controls an Island."
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Veil of Birds
oracle_text: When an opponent casts a spell, if Veil of Birds is an enchantment, Veil of Birds becomes a 1/1 Bird creature with flying.
flavor_text: When wind marries sky, even the bride's veil sings her praises.

name: Venomous Fangs
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to a creature, destroy the other creature.
flavor_text: All the pain of the shattered forest contained in a single drop.

name: Viashino Outrider
oracle_text: Echo {2}{R} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor_text: "Give thy ration to thy mount, if the road be long. So sayeth the bey."

name: Viashino Runner
oracle_text: Menace (This creature can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
flavor_text:
"It moved this way, an' that way, an' then before I could stick it, it jumped over my head an' was gone."
—Jula, goblin raider

name: Viashino Weaponsmith
oracle_text: Whenever Viashino Weaponsmith becomes blocked by a creature, Viashino Weaponsmith gets +2/+2 until end of turn.
flavor_text: Within the rig settlement, those who have mastered the making of weapons earn highest honor.

name: Wild Dogs
oracle_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, if a player has more life than each other player, the player with the most life gains control of Wild Dogs.
Cycling {2} ({2}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

name: Winding Wurm
oracle_text: Echo {4}{G} (At the beginning of your upkeep, if this came under your control since the beginning of your last upkeep, sacrifice it unless you pay its echo cost.)
flavor_text: Entire trees were stripped of their bark and branches by the wurm's writhing path.

name: Wizard Mentor
oracle_text: {T}: Return Wizard Mentor and target creature you control to their owner's hand.
flavor_text: Although some of the students quickly grasped the concept, the others could summon only blackboards.
